sentences.chinese: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.english: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.chinese: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

detailed_translations.english: the outer covering of a tree

sentences.english: Angus injured his leg playing rugby.
sentences.chinese: 安格斯在打橄榄球时弄伤了腿。

detailed_translations.english: to hurt yourself or someone else, for example in an accident or an attack

sentences.english: What more could an educator hope for than a student's desire to learn.
sentences.chinese: 除了学生的学习兴趣，教育者们别无所求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 教育家；教育工作者；教师
detailed_translations.english: a teacher or someone involved in the process of educating people

sentences.english: Violence erupted after police shot a student during the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 警察向示威人群中的一名学生开枪，暴乱随之发生。

sentences.english: A political row erupted over the MP’s comments.
sentences.chinese: 这名下院议员的评论引发了一场政治论战。

sentences.english: The volcano erupted in 1980, devastating a large area of Washington state.
sentences.chinese: 这座火山1980年喷发，摧毁了华盛顿州的大片地区。

detailed_translations.english: if fighting, violence, noise etc erupts, it starts suddenly

sentences.english: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.chinese: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.english: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.english: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago

sentences.english: She hired a detective to find out if her husband was having an affair.
sentences.chinese: 她雇了一个私人侦探调查她丈夫是否有外遇。

detailed_translations.english: a police officer whose job is to discover information about crimes and catch criminals

sentences.english: An earthquake measuring 6.1 on the Richter scale struck southern California on June 28.
sentences.chinese: 6月28日加州南部地区发生了里氏6.1级地震。

sentences.english: The city is in an earthquake zone.
sentences.chinese: 该市位于地震带。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden shaking of the earth’s surface that often causes a lot of damage

sentences.english: They own 200 acres of farmland.
sentences.chinese: 他们拥有200英亩农田。

sentences.english: a 200-acre wood
sentences.chinese: 一片200英亩的林地

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring area, equal to 4,840 square yards or 4,047 square metres

sentences.english: The house had belonged to her family for three or four generations.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子属于她家已有三四代了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 属于，应归入；居住；适宜；应被放置
detailed_translations.english: If something belongs to you, you own it

sentences.english: When approving a merger, the commission can attach conditions.
sentences.chinese: 委员会在批准公司合并时可能附加条件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缚， 系， 贴， 附加； 使依恋， 使喜爱； 使附属； 认为有
detailed_translations.english: to allow something to happen, but only if someone agrees to do a particular thing or accept a particular idea

sentences.english: Stratford-upon-Avon was Shakespeare’s birthplace.
sentences.chinese: 埃文河畔的斯特拉特福是莎士比亚的出生地。

detailed_translations.english: the place where someone was born, used especially when talking about someone famous

sentences.english: a master chef
sentences.chinese: 手艺高超的厨师长

sentences.english: a pastry chef
sentences.chinese: 糕饼师傅

detailed_translations.english: a skilled cook, especially the main cook in a hotel or restaurant

sentences.english: Her work is a fusion of several different styles.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品是几种不同风格的融合。

sentences.english: the best fusion cuisine in the whole of Vancouver
sentences.chinese: 全温哥华最好的混合料理

detailed_translations.chinese: 融合；熔化；熔接；融合物；[物] 核聚变
detailed_translations.english: a combination of separate qualities or ideas

sentences.english: The refugees come across the border in vast numbers.
sentences.chinese: 大量难民涌过边境。

sentences.english: In the past five years, there has been a vast improvement in graduation rates.
sentences.chinese: 过去的五年内，毕业率大幅度提高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨大的， 大量的； 浩瀚的
detailed_translations.english: extremely large

sentences.english: Italian food has been exported all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

detailed_translations.english: to sell goods to another country
to sell goods to another country
the business of selling and sending goods to other countries

sentences.english: I am very fond of Michael.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢迈克尔。

detailed_translations.english: feeling affection for sb, especially sb you have known for a long time

sentences.english: It’s warm enough to eat outdoors tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚很暖和，可以在户外用餐。

sentences.english: He likes to work outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢在户外工作。

detailed_translations.english: outside, not in a building
the countryside far away from buildings and cities

sentences.english: He has read many of the major works of literature.
sentences.chinese: 他读过许多重要的文学作品。

sentences.english: Italian literature
sentences.chinese: 意大利文学

sentences.english: literature on the history of science
sentences.chinese: 科学史的文献资料

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学，文学作品；文献；文献
detailed_translations.english: books, plays, poems etc that people think are important and good

sentences.english: Two contrary views emerged.
sentences.chinese: 出现了两种相反的观点。

sentences.english: The men shouted contrary orders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人大声喊叫的命令互相矛盾。

sentences.english: It wasn’t a good thing; on the contrary it was a huge mistake.
sentences.chinese: 那不是好事，恰恰相反，是个巨大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: contrary ideas, opinions, or actions are completely different and opposed to each other
used to add to a negative statement, to disagree with a negative statement by someone else, or to answer no to a question

sentences.english: We went along a broad passage.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在一条宽阔的走廊上。

sentences.english: He was six feet tall, with broad shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，肩膀宽阔。

detailed_translations.english: a road, river, or part of someone’s body etc that is broad is wide

sentences.english: a mother bear and her cubs
sentences.chinese: 母熊和它的熊崽们

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal with thick fur, that eats flesh, fruit, and insects

sentences.english: Gaelic is still spoken in Ireland by a tiny minority.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰仍有极少数人在说盖尔语。

detailed_translations.english: a small group of people or things within a much larger group

sentences.english: children from well-off families
sentences.chinese: 富裕家庭的孩子

sentences.english: Many pensioners are less well-off (= have less money ) than they used to be.
sentences.chinese: 许多退休人员生活都不如以前优裕了。

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, or enough money to have a good standard of living

sentences.english: an unfair advantage
sentences.chinese: 不公平的优势

sentences.english: laws aimed at preventing unfair competition
sentences.chinese: 旨在防止不公平竞争的法令

sentences.english: Many employers have recognized that age discrimination is unfair.
sentences.chinese: 许多雇主已经认识到年龄歧视是不公平的。

sentences.english: She won £20,000 for unfair dismissal(= being illegally made to leave your job ).
sentences.chinese: 她因被不公平解雇而得到两万英镑的赔偿。

detailed_translations.english: not right or fair, especially because not everyone has an equal opportunity

sentences.english: He didn’t look the sort of man to forgive and forget (= forgive someone and no longer think about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看上去不是那种不记仇的人。

detailed_translations.english: to stop being angry with someone and stop blaming them, although they have done something wrong

sentences.english: the press preview of the show (= when people who write for newspapers, television etc could see it )
sentences.chinese: 该节目的媒体试映

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you can see a film, play, painting etc before it is shown to the public
to see or describe something before it is shown to the public

sentences.english: The street lights go on at dusk.
sentences.chinese: 街灯在黄昏时亮起来。

detailed_translations.english: the time before it gets dark when the sky is becoming less bright

sentences.english: ...children growing up in a multicultural society.
sentences.chinese: …在多元文化社会中长大的孩子们。

detailed_translations.english: Multicultural means consisting of or relating to people of many different nationalities and cultures

sentences.english: a nice quiet spot on the beach
sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.english: I chose a spot well away from the road.
sentences.chinese: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

detailed_translations.english: a particular place or area, especially a pleasant place where you spend time

detailed_translations.chinese: 认出， 发现； 玷污
detailed_translations.english: to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize

sentences.english: Add a crushed clove of garlic (= single section of it ).
sentences.chinese: 加一瓣压碎的大蒜。

detailed_translations.english: a plant like a small onion, used in cooking to give a strong taste

sentences.english: She wiped her eyes with her apron.
sentences.chinese: 她用她的围裙擦干了眼泪。

sentences.english: She had put her louis in the pocket of her new apron.
sentences.chinese: 她已把她的那枚路易放在她新围裙的口袋里了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the front part of your clothes and is tied around your waist, worn to keep your clothes clean, especially while cooking

sentences.english: I ground my cigarette into the ashtray.
sentences.chinese: 我把香烟掐灭后扔入烟灰缸。

sentences.english: Drop your cigarette ashes into the ashtray.
sentences.chinese: 请把香烟灰弹在烟灰缸里。

sentences.english: He stubbed out his cigarette in the ashtray.
sentences.chinese: 他在烟灰缸内捻灭了他的香烟。

detailed_translations.english: a small dish where you put used cigarettes

sentences.english: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat plastic case containing  magnetic tape  , that can be used for playing or recording sound

sentences.english: Your hair needs a good comb.
sentences.chinese: 你的头发需要好好梳理一下。

sentences.english: Melanie ran upstairs to comb her hair.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮跑上楼去梳头发。

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of plastic, metal etc with a row of thin teeth on one side, used for making your hair tidy
to make hair look tidy using a comb

sentences.english: a pair of scissors
sentences.chinese: 一把剪刀

detailed_translations.english: a tool for cutting paper, cloth etc, made of two sharp blades fastened together in the middle, with holes for your finger and thumb

detailed_translations.chinese: 剪开；删除（scissor的第三人称单数）

sentences.english: A bomb planted in a dustbin exploded early today.
sentences.chinese: 一枚安置在一个垃圾桶内的炸弹今天清早爆炸了。

detailed_translations.english: a large container outside your house, used for holding waste until it is taken away

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

sentences.english: an essay comparing and contrasting (= showing how two things are similar and different ) Verdi and Wagner and their operas
sentences.chinese: 把威尔第和瓦格纳以及他们的歌剧进行比较和对照的一篇文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成对比， 对比之下显出区别
detailed_translations.english: if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising
something that is very different from something else
if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising
